results.title: [Nashville review : The Movie Show]
results.brief_description: In ‘The Movie Show’, Margaret Pomeranz and David Stratton look back on some of the classic films of the past. In this clip, the subject is Robert Altman’s ‘Nashville’ (1975), a breakthrough film for its episodic and improvisational elements.

results.title: [Mr. Corbett's holiday]
results.creator_credit: Crawford Productions, Qantas Airways, Protector International and David Lee
results.brief_description: Mr Henry J. Corbett arrives on a trip to Australia. Through his trip we are shown all the marvelous range of safety industrial gear made by Protector International. This films is basically a marketing tool for Protector and QANTAS.
